## Use the ucdavis1 dataset

From the ucdavis1 data set in tigerstats package test these two different hypothesis. Use both  
graphical displays with boxplots and inferential tests with t.tests  

1. $H_0$ The GPA of Males sitting in the Front seats is the same as that of Females in the Middle seats  
2. $H_0$ The GPA of Males sitting in the Middle seats is the same as that of Females in the Front seats
